name: Gather Requirements
description: Collect feedback from stakeholders and users to define key features.

name: Design Wireframes
description: Create initial wireframe layouts for main pages.

name: Develop Frontend
description: Implement the UI based on approved designs using React.

name: Define Target Audience
description: Analyze customer data to identify target demographics.

name: Create Content Plan
description: Draft a content calendar for posts and email newsletters.

name: Launch Campaign
description: Run social media ads and send out email sequences.
